summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2192 for the improvement of Fifteenth Avenue Northwest, from West Seventy-fifth Street to West Eighty-fifth Street, all in the City of Seattle, by laying watermains therein, together with all gates, tees, crosses, wyes and other appurtenances necessary for the reasonable water service and fire protection of said district; under Ordinance No. 21751, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
